message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be fair to propose a price of $7,500 for this valuable item. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $6,800 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and the market conditions, I am unable to accept $6,800. My next offer is $7,200. I hope this proposal will lead us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position. I would like to counter with a price of $7,000 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. After careful consideration, I am proposing a price of $7,100 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I look forward to your response.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. I would like to counter with a price of $7,050 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I am willing to consider $7,100 as a final offer. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while allowing for a fair profit. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've given this some thought and I'd like to counter with a price of $7,075 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After reviewing your latest offer, I am willing to consider $7,100 as a final offer for the product. This price acknowledges the value you place on it while also ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I hope this will be satisfactory.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered your last proposal and I would like to counter with a price of $7,080 for the product.
